amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that United States businesses should be encouraged to provide assistance to sub-Saharan African countries to prevent and reduce the incidence of HIV/AIDS.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 108-80 would express the sense of Congress that U.S. agencies should encourage U.S. businesses and private groups to provide assistance to sub-Saharan African countries to reduce the incidence of HIV/AIDS. Funds and assistance should be coordinated through a privately funded HIV/AIDS Response Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
